title: Digestive Balance: TCM Strategies for Gut Health
excerpt: Practical tips to reduce bloating, improve energy, and support digestion naturally.
author: Dr. Michael Huang
contentMarkdown:
Digestive health is central to energy and immunity. TCM focuses on strengthening the Spleen and balancing the gut.

## Key Foundations

- Eat warm, cooked meals
- Avoid excess sugar and cold drinks
- Keep meal timing consistent

## TCM Treatments

Acupuncture can reduce bloating and regulate bowel habits. Herbal formulas may support motility and reduce inflammation.
